newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's MOL falls, shares close weaker.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's MOL falls, shares close weaker.

text.p: 1445 GMT - Hungarian share prices closed lower on the Budapest Stock Exchange on Wednesday pulling the BUX index down from its peak.
* The BUX index fell almost two and a half percent to close at 5,368.64 points, down 131.10.
* Shares in oil company MOL - pushing the BUX index to highs in the past few days - tumbled to close at 3,180 forints, down 245.
* Spot share turnover totalled 3.14 billion forints.
